children.name: p
children: An older man gets up to exit the train, leaving behind a bushel of what looks like mint or some other herb.

children.name: p
children: Another person, also leaving, notices this:

children.name: p
children: "Excuse me, excuse me sir. I think you left something on the train."

children.name: p
children: "Oh did I?" the older man responds.

children.name: p
children: The man returns for his supposedly forgotten item, barely making it back through the doors, missing his stop as the train begins to take off.

children.name: strong
children: March 16, 2023 — San Francisco, CA, USA

children.name: p
children: A teenager is riding the bus home from school. He gets a call:

children.name: p
children: "No I can't, I have therapy."
"Well, sure. Come by later."

children.name: p
children: He hangs up and immediately makes another call:

children.name: p
children: "Can the guys come by for 30 minutes? They are in the neighborhood."
"For sure, for sure, thanks. Love you."

children.name: p
children: He flips his flip phone shut.

children.name: strong
children: September 24, 2022 — San Francisco, CA, USA

children.name: p
children: A man bicycles down the street, shouting “bueno” into his phone, emphatically gesturing with both hands at once.

children.name: strong
children: September 14, 2022 — Dublin, Ireland

children.name: p
children: After three missed attempts, a woman saunters away, her trash still a foot from the trash can.

children.name: strong
children: September 4, 2022 — San Francisco, CA, USA

children.name: p
children: A person with great resolve, sitting in the park, drinking a 20 ounce White Claw through a straw.

children.name: strong
children: September 3, 2022 — San Francisco, CA, USA
